## combineResultPromises() function

Combines multiple [MatchResult](./case-plugin-base.matchresult.md) objects / Promises containing match results.

**Signature:**

```typescript
combineResultPromises: (...results: (MatchResult | Promise<MatchResult>)[]) => Promise<MatchResult>
```
